title: Arabic chicken shish kebabs
ingredients: ['1/4 bunch coriander', '2 handfuls of mint leaves', '4 cloves garlic', '1 (2.5cm) piece root ginger', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '2 tablespoons oil', '200g Greek yoghurt', '4 skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into large pieces', '1 large onion, cut into cubes', '1 green pepper, cut into cubes', '1 red pepper, cut into cubes', '1 yellow pepper, cut into cubes', '100 to 200g button mushrooms, left whole or cut into halves']
